name: dhis2-orgunit-app
description: A custom app to manage adding new orgunits, which supports matching of existing orgunits

scripts.package: npm run build && bestzip dhis2-orgunit-app.zip css/ dist/ img/ js/ node_modules/ views/ index.html manifest.webapp
scripts.install: curl -X DELETE -u admin:district http://localhost:9999/api/apps/dhis2-orgunit-app || true && curl -X POST -u admin:district -F file=@dhis2-orgunit-app.zip http://localhost:9999/api/apps
scripts.deploy: npm run package && npm run install

author: Jembi Health Systems NPC
